title: Please help me fix this problem in the next update
body:
I cant play league anymore because I don't think League of Legends is compatible with Windows 8.2 and so if I try it keeps glitching and twitching so I cant play League of Legends anymore
Riot pls do something about this 


Thx a lot =D

replies.body:
> Windows 8.2

Please tell me where on Earth you got Windows 8.2 from.
